Description: Template v4.1.3: AWS CloudFormation Template for creating a Across-AZs cluster of 3NIC BIG-IPs in an existing VPC **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 Instances. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.

restrictedSrcAddressApp.default: Source Address(es) for Web Application Access (80/443)

Bigip1ExternalInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of the public interface on BIG-IP

Bigip1InstanceId.Description: Instance Id of BIG-IP in Amazon

Bigip1InternalInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of internal interface on BIG-IP

Bigip1ManagementInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of the management interface on BIG-IP

Bigip1VipPrivateIp.Description: VIP on External Interface Secondary IP 1

Bigip2ExternalInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of the public interface on BIG-IP

Bigip2InstanceId.Description: Instance Id of BIG-IP in Amazon

Bigip2InternalInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of internal interface on BIG-IP

Bigip2ManagementInterfacePrivateIp.Description: Internally routable IP of the management interface on BIG-IP

Vpc.ConstraintDescription: This must be an existing VPC within the working region.

allowUsageAnalytics.Description: This deployment can send anonymous statistics to F5 to help us determine how to improve our solutions. If you select **No** statistics are not sent.

costcenter.Description: Name of the Cost Center Tag

customImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid AMI Id
customImageId.Description: If you would like to deploy using a custom BIG-IP image, provide the AMI Id.  **Note**: Unless specifically required, leave the default of **OPTIONAL**

declarationUrl.Description: URL for the AS3 declaration JSON file to be deployed. Leave as **none** to deploy without a service configuration.

imageName.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid F5 BIG-IP VE image type
imageName.Description: Image names starting with All have all BIG-IP modules available. Image names starting with LTM have only the LTM module available.  Use Two Boot Locations if you expect to upgrade the BIG-IP VE in the future (the Two Boot Location options are only applicable to BIG-IP v13.1.1 or later).

instanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type for BIG-IP
instanceType.Description: Size of the F5 BIG-IP Virtual Instance

managementSubnetAz1.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

managementSubnetAz2.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

restrictedSrcAddress.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
restrictedSrcAddress.Description: The IP address range used to SSH and access managment GUI on the EC2 instances

restrictedSrcAddressApp.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
restrictedSrcAddressApp.Description: The IP address range that can be used to access web traffic (80/443) to the EC2 instances

sshKey.Description: EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the BIG-IP instance

subnet1Az1.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

subnet1Az2.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

subnet2Az1.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

subnet2Az2.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

Fn::Join: GATEWAY_MAC=`ifconfig eth1 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`;
GATEWAY_MAC2=`ifconfig eth2 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`
"tmsh modify sys db dhclient.mgmt { value disable }"
"tmsh modify cm device ${HOSTNAME} unicast-address { { effective-ip ${INTIP} effective-port 1026 ip ${INTIP} } }"
error_exit "$LINENO: An error has occurred while executing $CMD. Aborting!"
echo "Custom config download complete; checking for valid JSON."
echo "Failed to deploy custom application; continuing..."
echo "Custom config was not valid JSON, continuing..."
echo "Failed to download custom config; continuing..."
echo "Custom config was not a URL, continuing..."

#!/bin/bash
PROGNAME=$(basename $0)
function error_exit {
echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2
exit 1
}
date
echo 'starting rm-password.sh'
declare -a tmsh=()
tmsh+=("rm /config/cloud/aws/.adminPassword")
for CMD in "${tmsh[@]}"
do
  if $CMD;then
      echo "command $CMD successfully executed."
  else
      error_exit "$LINENO: An error has occurred while executing $CMD. Aborting!"
  fi
done
date
tmsh -a show sys mcp-state field-fmt | grep -q running
if ! tmsh load sys config merge file /config/verifyHash; then
if ! tmsh run cli script verifyHash "$fileToVerify"; then

/config/verifyHash.content:
cli script /Common/verifyHash {
proc script::run {} {
        if {[catch {
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs.tar.gz) 2ab601b44cb15118d533350af714cc2597881972b8c43bfca1c210c6927d9c4b166093ee5ca9a3cbaa03a84f6411cb4e42a1b95e4d244b870faede9537e92046
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs-aws.tar.gz) 076c969cbfff12efacce0879820262b7787c98645f1105667cc4927d4acfe2466ed64c777b6d35957f6df7ae266937dde42fef4c8b1f870020a366f7f910ffb5
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs-azure.tar.gz) 57fae388e8aa028d24a2d3fa2c029776925011a72edb320da47ccd4fb8dc762321c371312f692b7b8f1c84e8261c280f6887ba2e0f841b50547e6e6abc8043ba
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs-gce.tar.gz) 1677835e69967fd9882ead03cbdd24b426627133b8db9e41f6de5a26fef99c2d7b695978ac189f00f61c0737e6dbb638d42dea43a867ef4c01d9507d0ee1fb2f
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs-openstack.tar.gz) 5c83fe6a93a6fceb5a2e8437b5ed8cc9faf4c1621bfc9e6a0779f6c2137b45eab8ae0e7ed745c8cf821b9371245ca29749ca0b7e5663949d77496b8728f4b0f9
            set hashes(f5-cloud-libs-consul.tar.gz) 2c6face582064600553f442a67a58bc7c19533923fac72a88edef0a90a845a5b9c45b5ba340184292a27a3319d8b8118364d16ea17f6225d31f7c2e997be9775
            set hashes(asm-policy-linux.tar.gz) 63b5c2a51ca09c43bd89af3773bbab87c71a6e7f6ad9410b229b4e0a1c483d46f1a9fff39d9944041b02ee9260724027414de592e99f4c2475415323e18a72e0
            set hashes(f5.http.v1.2.0rc4.tmpl) 47c19a83ebfc7bd1e9e9c35f3424945ef8694aa437eedd17b6a387788d4db1396fefe445199b497064d76967b0d50238154190ca0bd73941298fc257df4dc034
            set hashes(f5.http.v1.2.0rc6.tmpl) 811b14bffaab5ed0365f0106bb5ce5e4ec22385655ea3ac04de2a39bd9944f51e3714619dae7ca43662c956b5212228858f0592672a2579d4a87769186e2cbfe
            set hashes(f5.http.v1.2.0rc7.tmpl) 21f413342e9a7a281a0f0e1301e745aa86af21a697d2e6fdc21dd279734936631e92f34bf1c2d2504c201f56ccd75c5c13baa2fe7653213689ec3c9e27dff77d
            set hashes(f5.aws_advanced_ha.v1.3.0rc1.tmpl) 9e55149c010c1d395abdae3c3d2cb83ec13d31ed39424695e88680cf3ed5a013d626b326711d3d40ef2df46b72d414b4cb8e4f445ea0738dcbd25c4c843ac39d
            set hashes(f5.aws_advanced_ha.v1.4.0rc1.tmpl) de068455257412a949f1eadccaee8506347e04fd69bfb645001b76f200127668e4a06be2bbb94e10fefc215cfc3665b07945e6d733cbe1a4fa1b88e881590396
            set hashes(f5.aws_advanced_ha.v1.4.0rc2.tmpl) 6ab0bffc426df7d31913f9a474b1a07860435e366b07d77b32064acfb2952c1f207beaed77013a15e44d80d74f3253e7cf9fbbe12a90ec7128de6facd097d68f
            set hashes(f5.aws_advanced_ha.v1.4.0rc3.tmpl) 2f2339b4bc3a23c9cfd42aae2a6de39ba0658366f25985de2ea53410a745f0f18eedc491b20f4a8dba8db48970096e2efdca7b8efffa1a83a78e5aadf218b134
            set hashes(f5.aws_advanced_ha.v1.4.0rc4.tmpl) 2418ac8b1f1884c5c096cbac6a94d4059aaaf05927a6a4508fd1f25b8cc6077498839fbdda8176d2cf2d274a27e6a1dae2a1e3a0a9991bc65fc74fc0d02ce963
            set hashes(asm-policy.tar.gz) 2d39ec60d006d05d8a1567a1d8aae722419e8b062ad77d6d9a31652971e5e67bc4043d81671ba2a8b12dd229ea46d205144f75374ed4cae58cefa8f9ab6533e6
            set hashes(deploy_waf.sh) 1a3a3c6274ab08a7dc2cb73aedc8d2b2a23cd9e0eb06a2e1534b3632f250f1d897056f219d5b35d3eed1207026e89989f754840fd92969c515ae4d829214fb74
            set hashes(f5.policy_creator.tmpl) 06539e08d115efafe55aa507ecb4e443e83bdb1f5825a9514954ef6ca56d240ed00c7b5d67bd8f67b815ee9dd46451984701d058c89dae2434c89715d375a620
            set hashes(f5.service_discovery.tmpl) 4811a95372d1dbdbb4f62f8bcc48d4bc919fa492cda012c81e3a2fe63d7966cc36ba8677ed049a814a930473234f300d3f8bced2b0db63176d52ac99640ce81b
            set hashes(f5.cloud_logger.v1.0.0.tmpl) 64a0ed3b5e32a037ba4e71d460385fe8b5e1aecc27dc0e8514b511863952e419a89f4a2a43326abb543bba9bc34376afa114ceda950d2c3bd08dab735ff5ad20
            set hashes(f5-appsvcs-3.5.1-5.noarch.rpm) ba71c6e1c52d0c7077cdb25a58709b8fb7c37b34418a8338bbf67668339676d208c1a4fef4e5470c152aac84020b4ccb8074ce387de24be339711256c0fa78c8

            set file_path [lindex $tmsh::argv 1]
            set file_name [file tail $file_path]

            if {![info exists hashes($file_name)]} {
                tmsh::log err "No hash found for $file_name"
                exit 1
            }

            set expected_hash $hashes($file_name)
            set computed_hash [lindex [exec /usr/bin/openssl dgst -r -sha512 $file_path] 0]
            if { $expected_hash eq $computed_hash } {
                exit 0
            }
            tmsh::log err "Hash does not match for $file_path"
            exit 1
        }]} {
            tmsh::log err {Unexpected error in verifyHash}
            exit 1
        }
    }
    script-signature 
    signing-key /Common/f5-irule
}

Fn::Join: while true; do echo "waiting for cloud libs install to complete"

Properties.Description: Public External Interface for the BIG-IP

Fn::Join: GATEWAY_MAC=`ifconfig eth1 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`;
GATEWAY_MAC2=`ifconfig eth2 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`
"tmsh modify sys db dhclient.mgmt { value disable }"
"tmsh modify cm device ${HOSTNAME} unicast-address { { effective-ip ${INTIP} effective-port 1026 ip ${INTIP} } }"
error_exit "$LINENO: An error has occurred while executing $CMD. Aborting!"

#!/bin/bash
PROGNAME=$(basename $0)
function error_exit {
echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2
exit 1
}
date
echo 'starting rm-password.sh'
declare -a tmsh=()
tmsh+=("tmsh modify sys application service HA_Across_AZs.app/HA_Across_AZs execute-action definition")
tmsh+=("rm /config/cloud/aws/.adminPassword")
for CMD in "${tmsh[@]}"
do
  if $CMD;then
      echo "command $CMD successfully executed."
  else
      error_exit "$LINENO: An error has occurred while executing $CMD. Aborting!"
  fi
done
date
tmsh -a show sys mcp-state field-fmt | grep -q running
if ! tmsh load sys config merge file /config/verifyHash; then
if ! tmsh run cli script verifyHash "$fileToVerify"; then

            if { $expected_hash eq $computed_hash } {
